title: IPCC Sixth Assessment Report — Summary for Policymakers
summary: Comprehensive assessment of observed climate change, attribution, projected impacts, and mitigation pathways. Publicly available synthesis summarizing peer-reviewed literature.

title: COVID-19: A global pandemic and the scientific response
summary: Collection of public reports and peer-reviewed studies summarizing virology, epidemiology, and public-health interventions during the COVID-19 pandemic.

title: Vaccines and Vaccine Safety: Evidence Reviews
summary: Systematic reviews and meta-analyses showing vaccine efficacy and safety profiles across large populations; reliable public sources.

title: Effectiveness of face masks for reducing transmission of SARS-CoV-2: a systematic review
summary: Meta-analytic evidence pooled from observational and experimental studies on mask effectiveness in community and healthcare settings.

title: Global trends in biodiversity and species extinction risk
summary: Assessments on species loss, drivers of biodiversity decline, and conservation evidence from public reports and peer-reviewed literature.

title: Climate change impacts on extreme weather events
summary: Peer-reviewed studies linking anthropogenic warming to increased frequency and intensity of heatwaves, heavy precipitation, and storm intensity.

title: The reproducibility crisis in science: evidence and proposals
summary: Analyses showing replication rates across fields and recommendations for improving reproducibility, transparency, and data sharing.

title: Antimicrobial resistance: global report
summary: Evidence on rising antimicrobial resistance, surveillance data, and best practices to limit spread — public health sources.

title: Nutritional epidemiology: challenges and opportunities
summary: Reviews discussing bias, confounding, and interpretation in nutritional studies; guidance for robust inference.

title: Smoking and health: 50 years of evidence and policy
authors: Public health agencies and systematic reviews
summary: Consolidated evidence linking tobacco use with morbidity and mortality and evaluating policy interventions.

title: Air pollution and public health: global exposure estimates
summary: Estimates of deaths attributable to air pollution and evidence of health impacts across populations.

title: Renewable energy pathways and decarbonization
summary: Evidence-based roadmaps for energy transition, costs, and technology feasibility from public agencies and journals.

title: Mental health prevalence and treatment gaps: systematic reviews
summary: Reviews documenting prevalence of common mental disorders and barriers to access care worldwide.

title: Food safety and outbreaks: surveillance reports
summary: Examples of outbreak investigations and best-practice surveillance to identify foodborne disease sources.

title: Ocean acidification and marine ecosystems
summary: Empirical studies documenting changes in ocean chemistry and impacts on calcifying organisms and fisheries.

title: Global economic inequality and data-driven analyses
summary: Analyses of income and wealth distributions and policy evaluations using public datasets.

title: Energy systems and health co-benefits of mitigation
summary: Evidence on how decarbonization can produce immediate public health benefits by reducing pollution exposure.

title: Transparency and open data in scientific publishing
summary: Studies and policy recommendations encouraging open data, preregistration, and reproducible workflows in research.
